In Eclipse 3.01, when I import the source for 1.0.4 i
get the following error:

Syntax error on token "assert", assert expected.
Obviously since the heritrix team can compile using
maven, it has something to do with the way eclipse is
configured, or some argument to the jvm. Does anyone
have any experiance with this?

Many thanks in advance for all your kind help.

Best,
Yousef


This comes up for the following files

Heritrix.java
CrawlJobHandler.java
CrawlUriSWFAction.java
ExtractorHTML.java
FilePatternFilter.java
Frontier.java
KeyedQueue.java
RuntimeErrorFormatter.java
MappedByteBufferInputStream.java
RecordingInputStream.java
RecordingOutputStream.java
ReplayCharSequenceFactory.java
AbstractLongFPSet.java
